channel.title: Need some coding help for 307 server
channel.description:
Hello. Im using allstarscape v2 base. And I have a few things i need help with.
1. How do i change the log in welcome screen, and also what it says in the chat box when you log in.
2. How Do i change what a charector starts with? Skills and items.
3. How do I find the Cords for places I want to spawn shops+Npcs.
4. How do I add custom commands for GMs, and regular players?

item.title: Need some coding help for 307 server
item.dc:creator: @kookajamo kookajamo
item.description:
@kookajamo wrote:

Were wud i find custom command or what u were talking about? And how would I make myself, and other people mods/admins?

Read full topic

item.source: Need some coding help for 307 server

item.title: Need some coding help for 307 server
item.dc:creator: @Squweakers Squweakers
item.description:
@Squweakers wrote:

  1. How do i change the log in welcome screen, and also what it says in the chat box when you log in
    -Search for one thing the welcome screen says in client.java
    Say the welcome screen says Server created by- Imiogo search in client.java server created by- imiogo
    and then u can change that
    How to change what it says in the chatbox
    Say it says:
    Welcome to lalala-scape
    Type ::starter to begin
    Server created by lalala
    Search For one of those in client.java so like search for type ::starter to begin and then you can change it!
  2. How Do i change what a charector starts with? Skills and items.
    -To change what ur char starts with in the file ‘player’ open it and search for unique

IT SHOULD SAY:

 Giving your player a unique look

Change the things that say like player helm player sheild
player chest player boots and all that! It is what the starter armor is!

  1. How do I find the Cords for places I want to spawn shops+Npcs.
  • Type either ::mypos and if that doesn’t work hit the emotes tab and by run and walk
    it will say your coords!
  1. How do I add custom commands for GMs, and regular players?
    I assume Gm’s means staff. Lets say you want a command called ::cash for staff! You would put this in client.java by the other commands:

if (command.startsWith("cash") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(995, 2147000000); }
Player rights = 2 is admin and player rights =1 is mod and player rights =0 is player! Hope this helped! Please reply,
Squweakers

Read full topic
item.source: Need some coding help for 307 server
